DOC.brief_title: Web-based Management Female Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: Female urinary incontinence common affect one fourth grownup woman . It may reduce quality life affect cost society high . The common type urinary incontinence stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) , i.e leakage coughing , sneeze jumping . There association SUI serious medical condition . Thus investigation keep minimum , include structured history take bladder diary correct diagnosis . Treatment lifestyle intervention pelvic floor muscle training ( PFMT ) give improvement cure 60-70 % woman . A small study indicate treatment cognitive behavioural therapy ( CBT ) may improve incontinence-related quality life symptom urinary incontinence . Web-based management SUI far know never evaluate randomize control study . The aim study determine web-based management female SUI , treatment use PFMT element CBT effective compare treatment support pamphlet . The duration treatment programme three month , follow-up four month , 1 year two year .
